name: return failure
xml:
<return status="failure">
	<parameter name="error-code" value="503"/>
	<parameter name="error-message" value="Unable to save ASDC artifact"/>
	<parameter name="ack-final" value="Y"/>

name: get-resource: asdc-reference SQLResource
xml:
<get-resource
	plugin='org.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.resource.sql.SqlResource' 
	resource='SQL'
	key="SELECT vnf_type, vnfc_type, file_category
	     FROM ASDC_REFERENCE
         WHERE artifact_name = $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.artifact-name ;"
    force='true'
	pfx='asdc-reference'>

name: save asdc-file SQLResource
xml:
<save 	plugin='org.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.resource.sql.SqlResource' 
	resource='SQL'
	key='INSERT INTO CONFIGFILES
	     SET data_source    = "ASDC",
	        vnf_type        =  $asdc-reference.vnf-type ,
	        vnfc_type       =  $asdc-reference.vnfc-type ,
	        file_category 	=  $asdc-reference.file-category ,
	        file_name       =  $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.artifact-name ,
	        file_content    =  $escapedData ;'
	    	force='true'

  	pfx='tmp.config-files'>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="info"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="vnf-type" value="`$asdc-reference.vnf-type`"/>
<parameter name="vnfc-type" value="`$asdc-reference.vnfc-type`"/>
<parameter name="file-category" value="`$asdc-reference.file-category`"/>

name: return failure
xml:
<return status="failure">
	<parameter name="error-code" value="502"/>
	<parameter name="error-message" value="Unable to retrieve asdc_resource"/>
	<parameter name="ack-final" value="Y"/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="info"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="file-contents" value="`$configuration-document-request-input.configuration-document-information.document-parameters[0].artifact-contents`"/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="info"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="error-code" value="503"/>

name: set deploy-error 503
xml:
<set>
	<parameter name="config-document-response.request-id" value="`$configuration-document-request-input.request-information.request-id`" />
	<parameter name="config-document-response.status" value="DEPLOY_ERROR" />
	<parameter name="config-document-response.error-reason" value="failure to store artifact" />

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="info"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="error-code" value="502"/>

name: set: deploy-error-502
xml:
<set>
	<parameter name="config-document-response.request-id" value="`$configuration-document-request-input.request-information.request-id`" />
	<parameter name="config-document-response.status" value="DEPLOY_ERROR" />
	<parameter name="config-document-response.error-reason" value="missing asdc_reference data for artifact-name" />
